name: ZAMB! Redux
description:
ZAMB! Redux is a mash-up of a twin stick shooter and a tower defence game. Play in co-op with a friend, sibling or partner as two space agents, Cye (the brawler) and Chrome (the tactician).

Exterminate hordes of biomutants created by a mad scientist. Mix and match turrets, powers and traps to find your favourite play styles - from close combat to long-range destruction. When your buddy isn’t there, go solo, switch dynamically between the characters and power through challenges on your own.
